name: angularSmoothscroll
readme: angular-smoothscroll ==================== An AngularJS directive to get a smooth scroll effect (like this: http://css-tricks.com/examples/SmoothPageScroll/) #How to use it? 1. Build Coffeescript `grunt coffee:dist` 2. Copy generated JS in .tmp folder and include it 3. Add the dependency to your app `app.module('myApp', ['angularSmoothscroll'])` 4. Declare an HTML the link element which start scroll and the target `Scroll to Target` 5. You can declare the offset (default is 100): `Scroll to Target` #How to contribute? 1. Clone this repo 2. Make your changes 3. Test them: `grunt test` 4. Open a pull-request Powered by AngularJS (http://angularjs.org), Yeoman (http://yeoman.io), Grunt (http://gruntjs.com) and Karma (http://karma-runner.github.io/0.8/index.html)
